titles.title: A resolution celebrating June 11, 2018, as the 20th anniversary of the establishment of the United States Coral Reef Task Force.
A resolution celebrating June 11, 2018, as the 20th anniversary of the establishment of the United States Coral Reef Task Force.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: Recognizes June 11, 2018, as the 20th anniversary of the establishment of the U.S. Coral Reef Task Force, and recognizes the importance of the coral reefs of the United States.
